name: Budi & the Holoid
description:
This is a completely free, unofficial classic short RPG fangame featuring the vtuber talents of Hololive Indonesia. The game follows the journey of a hero named Budi (pronounced as Boo-dee) in the land of Holoid.

AVAILABLE LANGUAGE OPTIONS:            

-Bahasa Indonesia

Disclaimers: This is a solo project and doesn't have any affiliated with Hololive or Cover Corp. in any way. This project was made while following all guidelines under the Hololive Derivative Works guidelines (https://en.hololive.tv/terms). There is no monetization in this game. All visual and music assets used in this game are licensed with free to use commercially and non-commercially(credited in the game manual).
